articles.title: The Catcher in the Rye
articles.body: If you really want to hear about it, the first thing you'll probably want to know is where I was born, and what my lousy childhood was like, and how my parents were occupied and all before they had me, and all that David Copperfield kind of crap, but I don't feel like going into it, if you want to know the truth.

articles.title: The Hunger Games
articles.body: The Hunger Games is a dystopian novel by Suzanne Collins, set in a future where a cruel and oppressive regime forces children to fight to the death in a televised spectacle. The story follows Katniss Everdeen, a 16-year-old girl who volunteers to take her sister's place in the deadly competition. Along with Peeta Mellark, a boy from her district, she must survive the brutal arena and outwit the ruthless Capitol. The Hunger Games is a thrilling and captivating adventure that explores themes of survival, rebellion, and love.
